```{r load-lib, message = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(RColorBrewer)
# Add any other libraries here



```


```{r load-data}
# load your data 
AVONET3_BirdTree <- read_excel("data/AVONET3_BirdTree.xlsx", 
    sheet = "AVONET3_BirdTree")
View(AVONET3_BirdTree)


```

```{r}
Bird_data <- AVONET3_BirdTree %>%
  select(Species3, Total.individuals, Beak.Length_Culmen, Habitat, Trophic.Level, Trophic.Niche) %>%
  filter(Trophic.Level == "Omnivore")



Total_Habitat <- Bird_data %>%
  group_by(Habitat) %>%
  summarise(total.birds = sum(Total.individuals)) %>%
  slice(- 7)



ggplot(data  = Total_Habitat, 
       aes(x = Habitat,
           y = total.birds,
           fill = Habitat)) +
         geom_col() +
  theme_minimal() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 5)) +
      scale_fill_brewer(type = "seq",
                        palette = 1,
                        direction = 1,
                        aesthetics = "fill") +
  labs(title = "Total bird count within each habitat",
       x = "Habitat",
       y = "Total Birds")
```


```{r}
Bird_data <- AVONET3_BirdTree %>%
  select(Species3, Total.individuals, Beak.Length_Culmen, Habitat, Trophic.Level, Trophic.Niche) %>%
  filter(Habitat == "Forest")

total_trophic <- AVONET3_BirdTree %>%
  group_by(Trophic.Niche) %>%
  summarise(total.birds = sum(Total.individuals)) %>%
  slice(c(1,2,3,4,5,6,8,9,10,11))

Bird_data <- left_join(total_trophic, Bird_data) %>%
  select(-Total.individuals)

colours <- rep("pink", length(unique(Bird_data$Trophic.Niche)))

ggplot(data = total_trophic,
       mapping = aes(x = Trophic.Niche, 
                     y = total.birds,
                     fill = Trophic.Niche)) + 
  geom_col()

ggplot(data = Bird_data,
       mapping = aes( x = Trophic.Niche,
                      y = Beak.Length_Culmen,
                      fill = Trophic.Niche)) + 
  geom_boxplot() +
  scale_fill_manual(values = colours) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(size = 5.5)) +
  labs(title = "Culmen length of each trophic niche",
       subtitle = "Forest Habitat",
       x = "Trophic Niche",
       y= "Beak Length Culmen") 
```
